text: Puma Ranra (Quechua puma cougar, puma, ranra stony place) erroneously also spelled Pumrangra) is a mountain in the Wansu mountain range in the Andes of Peru, about high. It is situated in the Arequipa Region, Condesuyos Province, Cayarani District. Puma Ranra lies south of Janq'u Q'awa and Saxa Q'awa at the Puma Ranra valley (Pumaranra) in the west. == References == Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Mountains of Arequipa Region
title: Puma Ranra (Condesuyos)
